name: memolery
description:
Memorize the path and avoid the obstacles to help the mole catch the worm in this memory card game for all ages.

Small game created inspired by the theme of  the Ludum Dare 48: Deeper and Deeper, and finished just in time for the starting of the next one!  (took me only ANOTHER 6 months to finish a 48 hours game!)
